rules.natural: Provided that the solar division develops the solar panel, Green Corp qualifies for a tax incentive.
Either the solar division develops the solar panel, or Green Corp manufactures the electronic device.
Under the condition that Green Corp offers a green bond, the green bond is approved by the standards board.
Green Corp offers a green bond, or the green bond invests in a fossil fuel project.
Provided that the green bond invests in a fossil fuel project, it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest.
Whenever the green bond is approved by the standards board, Green Corp passes an environmental audit.
Under the condition that Sarah Lee issues a CEO directive regarding sustainability, if Green Corp achieves carbon neutrality, then Green Corp qualifies for a tax incentive.
Given that there is board approval for the sustainability initiative, whenever Green Corp manufactures the electronic device, Green Corp qualifies for a tax incentive.
If board member Jones votes for the sustainability initiative, then board member Smith votes for the sustainability initiative.
Provided that board member Smith votes for the sustainability initiative, board member Chen votes for the sustainability initiative.

Whenever Roberts provides chair support for the sustainability initiative, if board member Chen votes for the sustainability initiative, then there is board approval for the sustainability initiative.
If Green Corp manufactures the electronic device, then Green Corp achieves carbon neutrality.
Under the condition that Green Corp manufactures the electronic device, the electronic device uses renewable power.

Whenever the internal audit report finds energy inefficiency, if it is not the case that the electronic device being energy efficient implies it reduces carbon footprint, then Green Corp receives a government fine.
The internal audit report finds energy inefficiency, or the external consultant report finds energy inefficiency.

Given that the tech team reviews the analysis of the internal audit, if the external consultant report finds energy inefficiency, then if it is not the case that the electronic device being energy efficient implies it reduces carbon footprint, Green Corp receives a government fine.
The tech team reviews the analysis of the internal audit, or the tech team reviews the analysis of the external consultant.

Provided that the tech team recommends an upgrade, if the tech team reviews the analysis of the external consultant, then if the external consultant report finds energy inefficiency, then if it is not the case that the electronic device being energy efficient implies it reduces carbon footprint, Green Corp receives a government fine.
Under the condition that the CTO authorizes the tech upgrade project, if the CFO approves the budget for the tech upgrade, then the tech team recommends an upgrade.
If the electronic device reduces carbon footprint, then Green Corp qualifies for a tax incentive.
Under the condition that the supply chain sources recycled metal materials, the supply partner is a certified supplier of recycled metal.
If the recycled metal meets the ISO 14001 standard, then the electronic device reduces carbon footprint.
The supply chain uses uncertified materials, or if the supply partner is a certified supplier of recycled metal, then the recycled metal meets the ISO 14001 standard.
If Green Corp hires a compliance officer, then the compliance officer trains staff on environmental policy.
Green Corp hires a compliance officer, or Green Corp retains a compliance consultant.
Under the condition that Green Corp retains a compliance consultant, Green Corp passes an environmental audit, or it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest.
If the compliance officer trains staff on environmental policy, then the compliance officer implements a monitoring system.
If the electronic device uses renewable power, then the supply chain sources recycled metal materials.
Under the condition that the electronic device uses renewable power, the electronic device is energy efficient.
Provided that Green Corp selects an eco-friendly site, Green Corp passes an environmental audit.
If Green Corp selects a brownfield site, then it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest.
The planning department submits a plan for an eco-friendly site, or the planning department submits a plan for a brownfield site.
Provided that the planning department submits a plan for a brownfield site, Green Corp selects an eco-friendly site, or Green Corp selects a brownfield site.
The city council reviews the planning department's plan, or the environment agency reviews the planning department's plan.
Provided that the environment agency reviews the planning department's plan, if the planning department submits a plan for an eco-friendly site, then Green Corp violates a zoning law.
The city council grants a permit to Green Corp, or the environment agency grants a permit to Green Corp.

Provided that the environment agency grants a permit to Green Corp, if the city council reviews the planning department's plan, then if the planning department submits a plan for an eco-friendly site, Green Corp violates a zoning law.

Under the condition that the regulatory body issues a license to Green Corp, if the city council reviews the planning department's plan, then if the planning department submits a plan for an eco-friendly site, Green Corp violates a zoning law.
Provided that Green Corp appeals a decision to the city council, Green Corp wins an appeal.
Green Corp appeals a decision to the city council, or if the city council grants a permit to Green Corp, then the regulatory body issues a license to Green Corp.
The manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest, or Green Corp qualifies for a tax incentive.
If it is not the case that the CEO signing off on the tech upgrade implies the CTO authorizes the tech upgrade project, then the legal department delays the project.
Provided that it is not the case that the CEO signing off on the tech upgrade implies the CTO authorizes the tech upgrade project, it is not the case that the legal department delays the project.

Provided that it is not the case that the compliance officer implementing a monitoring system implies (Green Corp passes an environmental audit or it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest), it is not the case that Green Corp fails a compliance check.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the electronic device being energy efficient implies it reduces carbon footprint, it is not the case that Green Corp receives a government fine.

Provided that it is not the case that (it is not the case that the compliance officer implementing a monitoring system implies (Green Corp passes an environmental audit or it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest)) implies Green Corp fails a compliance check, Green Corp passes a compliance check.

If it is not the case that (it is not the case that the compliance officer implementing a monitoring system implies (Green Corp passes an environmental audit or it is not the case that the manufacturing plant is located in a protected forest)) implies Green Corp fails a compliance check, then it is not the case that Green Corp passes a compliance check.

Under the condition that it is not the case that (it is not the case that the electronic device being energy efficient implies it reduces carbon footprint) implies Green Corp receives a government fine, Green Corp receives a public award.
If it is not the case that Roberts provides chair support for the sustainability initiative, then Roberts expresses chair opposition to the sustainability initiative.
